main_definition: A sum of money placed or paid into a bank account, investment, or other financial institution.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To put something in a safe place for safekeeping
meanings_and_examples.example: I will deposit the valuable artifacts with the museum to keep them secure.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Payment made by check or cash directly into an account at a bank
meanings_and_examples.example: I received my salary today and I'll be depositing it into my checking account tomorrow.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A sum of money paid in advance to reserve or hold a service, product, or property
meanings_and_examples.example: The customer made a $50 deposit to secure their spot at the concert venue.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Financial transaction where funds are transferred from one account to another
meanings_and_examples.example: I will be transferring my savings into a different bank for better interest rates.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A record of the amount, date and place deposited
meanings_and_examples.example: The bank statement shows all my recent deposits to my checking account.
